body: Borrow Future (Time), Crush Will (Command), Disappear* (Concealing), Elder Cure (Healing), Paralyze Creature (Binding), Perfect Form (Body), Purify (Life), Servitor IV (Summoning), Simple Order* (Command), Sound Blast (Sonic), Unseen Shell (Concealing)
